commit.message:
Remove contrib/debian/patches subdirectory

The directory hasn’t been touched in five years and seems like something that could be added again later if needed. Remove the subdirectory.

Remove contrib/debian/patches subdirectory

The directory hasn’t been touched in five years and seems like something that could be added again later if needed. Remove the subdirectory.
